meanings.definition: A sweet, brown oval fruit that grows on palm trees.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on dates for a healthy treat.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh dates from the local palm trees.
meanings.sent3: The dates in my smoothie made it taste like a tropical paradise.
meanings.sent4: The dates on the palm tree looked like jewels hanging from the branches.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of dates filled the kitchen as I baked a dessert.

meanings.definition: A particular day or year when an event happened or will happen.
meanings.sent1: My birthday falls on important dates in history.
meanings.sent2: The teacher marked the dates of the upcoming exams on the calendar.
meanings.sent3: On the dates of the school play, everyone was excited and nervous.
meanings.sent4: The dates on the timeline marked significant moments in our country's history.
meanings.sent5: Remembering the dates of anniversaries is important to show love and care.

meanings.definition: To go out socially on dates with someone.
meanings.sent1: They decided to dates at the new restaurant in town.
meanings.sent2: She dates her partner every Friday night for a romantic dinner.
meanings.sent3: The couple dates regularly to keep their relationship strong.
meanings.sent4: He dates different people to find the right match for him.
meanings.sent5: Dating can be a fun way to get to know someone better.
